results.title: Deciphering the Antifibrotic Property of Metformin
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is known to have antidiabetic properties but has never been tested in the context of an in vitro model of MSC-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Metformin attenuates renal tubulointerstitial fibrosis via upgrading autophagy in the early stage of diabetic nephropathy
results.text_hl: The scavenging activity was significantly higher after 4 weeks of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment than after 12 weeks, which may be attributed to the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on delaying the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ at an early stage rather than reversing the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ throughout the process.
